§ 2456. Coordination with General Services Administration To avoid unnecessary duplication, the Administrator of General Services and the Secretary of Defense shall coordinate the cataloging and standardization activities of the General Services Administration and the Department of Defense. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 140.)
